attributes.action: Reduce the VAT rate for salons to 9% and lower the VAT threshold to Nil
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the current VAT threshold is too high, and some businesses deliberately trade just under this to avoid VAT and other costs.
 
Ireland has had a reduced rate of 9% for salons, to support the sector, and we want the UK Government to implement this here.
attributes.background: Level the trading field for salons across the UK by lowering the VAT threshold to Nil so all pay VAT, and reducing the VAT rate to 9%, to give the sector a chance to recover and grow.
